title: Avocado chicken club sandwich
ingredients: ['12 slices mixed grain bread', '4 tbsp mayonnaise', '115 g (4 oz) iceberg lettuce, finely shredded', '115 g (4 oz) cooked chicken breast meat, skin removed, then sliced', '4 slices Parma ham, cut into strips', '1 avocado', '1 tbsp lime juice', '1 orange, peeled and chopped', '1 bunch of watercress, tough stalks discarded', '20 g (3/4 oz) alfalfa sprouts', '2 tsp pumpkin seeds, toasted', 'pepper']
